snippet: President Obama's team of economic advisers are revising their forecasts on the nation's unemployment rate.
abstract: President Obama's team of economic advisers are revising their forecasts on the nation's unemployment rate.
lead_paragraph: Jackie Calmes reports that advisers to President Obama, drawing on a string of improved economic data, have updated their forecasts in recent days and now project that the economy will create two million jobs this year, reducing the unemployment rate to about 8 percent by year's end.

headline.main: A Rosier Jobs Outlook From Obama's Advisers

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: White House Council of Economic Advisers
